ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] JBoots
ygData.msgSnippet: Just an FYI, you can kill those witches at around level 25. Astur, Cleric of Brell Solusek Ro
ygData.messageBody:
Just an FYI, you can kill those witches at around level 25.

Astur, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro

>
> From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>
> Today on the EQ newsgroup someone posted this message about the jboots.
>
> "Recently it seems that the Devs have implemented a way so that Journeyman
> Boots can no longer be traded from person to person by means of looting
> corpses. This new rule irritates me, to say the least. I am deleting my
> account and trying to give the boots to a friend whom I do not want to see
> wasting away while camping for his own pair. Isn't there some way to trade
> the darned things? If not, this only heightens the camping
> problem. Call me
> a twink if you will. I prefer to call myself practical"
>
> I went on to post....
>
> "From what I've heard you can not trade, sell or drop the jboots. I agree
> tho if you have to get them yourself and from what I've heard
> about getting
> them takes forever it just makes camping worse then before. Cause now
> you'll have tons of Lvl 35-40s sitting around waiting for the NPC to spawn
> in hopes that it'll have the jboots".
>
> Or at least I think it's around Lvl 35-40 for the JBoots.
>
> **************************
> Azor
> Lvl 16 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> **************************
>
